messages.title: 60 Second Q&A
messages.content: Explains the reasons for standing in Calder Valley, believes in the community and wants to fight for the things that matter. Describes the type of MP he would be, mentioning open, honest, transparent, and a non-career politician. Discusses the effects of the credit crunch and expresses the need for action.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Promises to publish expenses and tell it as it is.
Understands and respects the diverse needs and communities in Calder Valley.
For the future of Calder Valley, focusing on Education, NHS and Elderly Care.

issues.education: Fight Nationally for the future of Calder Valley, focusing on Education.
issues.health: Fight Nationally for the future of Calder Valley, focusing on NHS.

leaflet.personalStatement: Explains the reasons for standing in Calder Valley and the type of MP he would be.

politicalExperience.achievements: Understanding the effects of the credit crunch.

contactInformation.address: Spring Villa, 16 Church Lane, Brighouse, West Yorkshire, HD6 1AT.

images.caption: CRAIG WHITTAKER A VOTE FOR CHANGE

leaflet.additionalNotes: Leaflet includes images of Craig Whittaker supporting local traders and being involved with the community.
